00014 /* ppmAttrs.h (do not include this file directly - include pph.h instead) */
00015 
00016 #ifndef PPM_PPM_ATTRS_H
00017 #define PPM_PPM_ATTRS_H
00018 
00019 //
00020 // Put this in the versionString field
00021 //
00022 #define PPM_VERSION_STRING  "2.2"
00023 
00024 typedef enum ppmModelTypeE {
00025     PPM_MT_PERIPHERAL = 77
00026 } ppmModelType;
00027 
00028 //
00029 // Control the visibility of the model in debug and introspection.
00030 // Bit-mask or boolean.
00031 //
00032 typedef enum ppmVisibilityE {
00033     PPM_VISIBLE,
00034     PPM_INVISIBLE
00035 } ppmVisibility;
00036 
00037 //
00038 // Model release status
00039 //
00040 typedef enum ppmReleaseStatusS {
00041     PPM_UNSET,
00042     PPM_INTERNAL,
00043     PPM_RESTRICTED,
00044     PPM_IMPERAS,
00045     PPM_OVP,
00046 } ppmReleaseStatus;
00047 
00048 typedef struct ppmModelAttrS {
00049 
00051     // VERSION and IDENTIFICATION
00053 
00054     ppmString              versionString;    // Must be PPM_VERSION_STRING
00055     ppmModelType           type;             // MUST be set to PPM_PERIPHERAL
00056 
00058     // Model status
00060 
00061     ppmVisibility          visibility;       // model instance is invisible
00062     ppmReleaseStatus       releaseStatus;    // model release status (enum)
00063     Bool                   saveRestore;      // model supports save and restore
00064 
00066     // Callbacks
00068 
00069     ppmBusPortSpecFn       busPortsCB;       // next bus port callback
00070     ppmNetPortSpecFn       netPortsCB;       // next net port callback
00071     ppmPacketnetPortSpecFn packetnetPortsCB; // next net port callback
00072     ppmParameterSpecFn     paramSpecCB;      // next parameter callback
00073     ppmSaveStateFn         saveCB;           // PSE state save callback
00074     ppmRestoreStateFn      restoreCB;        // PSE state restore callback
00075     ppmDocFn               docCB;            // This function installs
00076                                              // documentation nodes
00077 
00079     // Data needed by a simulator for peripheral model.
00081 
00082     // Location of this model
00083     ppmVlnvInfo vlnv;
00084 
00085     // Optional Extension library used when the model requires native code
00086     ppmString   extension;
00087 
00088     // Path to PDF documentation
00089     ppmString   doc;
00090 
00091      // Model family string
00092     ppmString   family;
00093 
00094 } ppmModelAttr, *ppmModelAttrP;
00095 
00096 #endif
